languages.text: "После стольких лет, когда нам нельзя было носить ничего тяжелее гаечного ключа... Считайте, что мы пытаемся компенсировать былое чувство незащищенности". {n}Монтэг улыбается, но как-то натянуто.{/n}
"After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}
languages.original_text: "После стольких лет, когда нам нельзя было носить ничего тяжелее гаечного ключа... Считайте, что мы пытаемся компенсировать былое чувство незащищенности". {n}Монтэг улыбается, но как-то натянуто.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I guess you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Monteg's smile looks a little strained.{/n}
"After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I guess you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Monteg's smile looks a little strained.{/n}
"After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Monteg's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}
"After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Monteg's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}
"After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}
"After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}

languages.text: «Después de todos estos años sin poder llevar nada más pesado que una llave de tuerca... podría decir que lo estamos compensando». {n}La sonrisa de Einrich parece un poco forzada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Después de todos estos años sin poder llevar nada más pesado que una llave de tuerca... podría decir que lo estamos compensando». {n}La sonrisa de Einrich parece un poco forzada.{/n}

languages.text: 「レンチより重いものを持つことが許されなかったこの数年を思えば…過剰だと言えるかもしれませんね」{n}アインリッヒの笑顔は、どこか緊張しているように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「レンチより重いものを持つことが許されなかったこの数年を思えば…過剰だと言えるかもしれませんね」{n}アインリッヒの笑顔は、どこか緊張しているように見える。{/n}

languages.text: “这么多年，我们除了扳手之外，什么东西都不准拿……我猜，我们可能是有点矫枉过正了吧。”{n}艾因里奇的笑容显得有些勉强。{/n}
languages.original_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这么多年，我们除了扳手之外，什么东西都不准拿……我猜，我们可能是有点矫枉过正了吧。”{n}艾因里奇的笑容显得有些勉强。{/n}

languages.text: "Nach all den Jahren, in denen wir nichts Schwereres tragen durften als einen Schraubenschlüssel ... könnte man wohl sagen, dass wir überkompensieren." {n}Einrichs Grinsen sieht etwas angestrengt aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nach all den Jahren, in denen wir nichts Schwereres tragen durften als einen Schraubenschlüssel ... könnte man wohl sagen, dass wir überkompensieren." {n}Einrichs Grinsen sieht etwas angestrengt aus.{/n}

languages.text: « Après toutes ces années où il nous a été interdit de porter quoi que ce soit de plus lourd qu'une clé à molette... J'imagine qu'on peut dire qu'on rattrape le temps perdu. » {n}Le sourire d'Einrich vous paraît plus tendu que d'ordinaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Après toutes ces années où il nous a été interdit de porter quoi que ce soit de plus lourd qu'une clé à molette... J'imagine qu'on peut dire qu'on rattrape le temps perdu. » {n}Le sourire d'Einrich vous paraît plus tendu que d'ordinaire.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunca yıldır boru anahtarından ağır bir şey kuşanamayınca... Hasret gideriyoruz diyelim." {n}Einrich'in tebessümü, bir nebze yapmacık duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "After all these years of not being allowed to carry anything heavier than a wrench... I suppose you could say we are overcompensating." {n}Einrich's smile looks somewhat strained.{/n}
